Seasons Of Code

Animations in DWM    • Meet Udeshi   

WnCC - Seasons of Code

Seasons of Code is a programme launched by WnCC along the lines of the Google Summer of Code. It provides one with an opprtunity to learn and participate in a variety of interesting projects under the mentorship of the very best in our institute.

Animations in DWM

• Meet Udeshi   
• Development and X Window Management

Openings:
One.

Building and Setting up dwn on any OS, and creating a patch to add animation support to it.

Animations in dwm

dwm or Dynamic Window Manager is an extremely lightweight window manager (25KB of source code). It has no external configuration and only believes in configuring the source code (using C header) directly. The project would involve understanding X window management using dwm, building and setting up dwm on any OS (Arch or Void preferably) and creating a patch to add animation support to it.

The Web and Coding Club

We are the coding community of IIT Bombay. WnCC is one of the biggest clubs of IIT Bombay. We believe that every individual should know how to code. Under the aegis of ITC (former STAB), we carry forward our vision of propagating the enthusiasm for coding in our institute.
